html:
2.1.18  9:56 pm   http://vidcon.com/featured-creators/
do you know why you are at the bottom?

     no

2.1.18  9:48 pm   is believing in my self good, even when i am taking a very weird and mysterious path?

     yes

2.1.18  9:03 pm   What happened to your shift key

     nothing

2.1.18  8:55 pm   I just achieved something.How should I celebrate it?

     achieve something else

2.1.18  8:48 pm   would a combination of scrabble and boggle be called 'scrobble' or 'baggle'? thanks.

     babble

2.1.18  8:37 pm   why don't you just make a clone of yourself and lock him up in the basement making content 24/7 come on it's 2018 we have the technology

     you may be forgetting that a clone starts as a baby
2.1.18  8:01 pm   can i have your number

2.1.18  8:00 pm   if there was a pen and paper in front of you what would you do with them?

     write a letter to the Royal Family, requesting permission to join their family

2.1.18  7:31 pm   what can do if im not happy with where I am in life?

     embark on some adventures

2.1.18  6:57 pm   do you ever ponder over what would happen if you actually took a couple hundred years to make a project perfect

     yes, i would completely lose direction after 1 year

2.1.18  6:14 pm   As a featured creator, what are you gonna be doing at Vidcon?

     i don't know

2.1.18  6:14 pm   what do u plan to do at vidcon

     i don't know

2.1.18  5:57 pm   what should I be doing

     you'll never know

2.1.18  5:57 pm   What's your favorite monetary acquisition of U.S. territory?

     well the gadsten is pretty neat but the louisiana one is just wild, an unshakable classic

2.1.18  5:52 pm   Bill, I come up with a lot of ideas but then I overthink what I'm doing and I don't get to a result. Drawing something only to erase in frustration, or write a melody then dislike it and delete it . Do you experience this? How do you handle it?

     try erasing the entire universe

2.1.18  5:47 pm   Hey, congratulations on the vidcon thing. What does being a featured artist entail?

     i don't know

      Will you play music?

     no

2.1.18  5:42 pm   When did you start the question page?

     i started taking questions in may 2015 but then i moved it to this site on 3.31.16

2.1.18  5:41 pm   Even though you've answered it a thousand times, and we've seen you using them in your videos, why do people still ask about capital letters? I don't get it.

      i don't know either. i use them in every video, and i use them all over the place on this questions page. i think it comes from the fact that i don't usually capitalize the beginning of sentences, but if you take a look around, you may realize another freaky thing which is that half the people asking the questions don't do that either. actually sometimes people who ask about capital letters don't even use them

2.1.18  5:39 pm   Thoughts on Valentine's Day 

     not at this time

2.1.18  4:38 pm   why not strive to make something as good as humanly possible, and work it until perfection. Why settle for anything less than something COMPLETELY CRAZY and WILD that will blow everyone's minds,. thats what i say

     the only problem with that is that could actually take forever, and after a couple hundred years the project might start to fall apart

2.1.18  4:08 pm   How do you know when a video is finished?

     i just have to guess

2.1.18  4:04 pm   how long does it usually take you to make a video?

     any where between 1 second and 11 months

2.1.18  3:40 pm   if you had a small loan of a million dollars, what would you do with it?

     pay it back immediately

2.1.18  3:15 pm   so the new idea is that you upload a song then a video? or does it just depend on whatever's going down?

     i'm not sure

2.1.18  3:15 pm   will we ever be able to leave this planet and live somewhere else?

     sure

2.1.18  2:57 pm   Do you enjoy making videos on youtube?

     i actually make the videos outside of youtube, and then upload them to my website. and then upload them to youtube also, if it's a kind of video i think would go well on youtube

2.1.18  2:38 pm   Do you have any opinions on racism? 

      it's a bad sad game where anyone can lose, even if you're not playing

2.1.18  2:29 pm   Are you ever going to write in your notebook again?

     that was never a place to write. that is a place to upload things which i have written previously

2.1.18  2:24 pm   why my reverb pedal does not work?

     that's nature's way of saying reverb is going out of style again

2.1.18  2:24 pm   Have you ever considered making your music in virtual reality and using a computer in virtual reality to produce the music, then having someone listen to your music in virtual reality? 

     seems legit

2.1.18  2:19 pm   who's poster is that in your room below the 240?

     i think it belonged to the previous person who lived here but i guess it's mine now

2.1.18  1:18 pm   If BEADGCF is the order of flats and FCGDAEB is the order of sharps, then what is the order of naturals?

     either one of those. depending on which way you are going

2.1.18  1:15 pm   You know i waited and waited for you to answer my question but then i figured it out myself and i decided I'd rather not be in a relationship where i don't feel anything, even if it happened overnight, rather than trying to fucking fix it or fix myself
Thanks for nothing Bill

     ok. let me know if there is anything else i can help you with today

2.1.18  1:11 pm   Please go to VidCon this year. I will pay for your ticket with my own money if i have to.

     i am going. i am a featured person there

2.1.18  1:09 pm   Do you think that technology will play a role in the biological evolution of humans?

     sure

2.1.18  1:00 pm   what motivates you to finish a song?

     so people will hear it

2.1.18  12:42 pm   What's a valentine?

     that's a great question and i have no idea

2.1.18  12:23 pm   what is the purpose of your videos?

     to share some of my thoughts, feelings, and ideas

2.1.18  12:21 pm   What is a zebra?

     it's not a horse, i'll tell you that much. i'm not making that mistake again

2.1.18  12:18 pm   what is your opinion on gun control?

     some days you wanna just get out there and control the hell out of some guns

2.1.18  12:07 pm   Why haven*t ve made U the precident yet? Would at least be better than current one.

     if i did that i would not have any time to make any more songs of videos for at least 4 years. also i am not old enough

2.1.18  11:09 am   Would you consider making jingles for other YouTubers?

     i barely have enough time to make them for myself

2.1.18  10:52 am   why do i explain the same things to myself over and over and over and a billion times over?

     to hope that maybe one of these days you will get the picture

2.1.18  10:35 am   Do you believe in yousef

     yes

2.1.18  10:29 am   Why do a lot of your songs talk about going home? Is there a specific reason for that?

     i don't know, i have been to re-hab for it but appearently i can't stop

2.1.18  10:19 am   When do you think you'll do the next batch of reality videos?

     whenever i think it's a strong career move to make the other content take even longer

2.1.18  10:11 am   what is the meaning behind the song 'la de da de da de da de day oh'?

     music, good and bad times, joy, self expression, and understanding

2.1.18  10:04 am   Do you plan on doing a TED Talk?

     i thought ted was already doing them

2.1.18  10:08 am   i like looking at trees

     ah, #relatable

2.1.18  8:23 am   What is your favourite type of quark or other elementary particle?

     the planckton
